articles.title: Massena Central looks to develop AI policy

articles.summary: The Massena Central School District introduced teachers and students to artificial intelligence this year. There is no policy regarding its use. School board member Robert M. LeBlanc wants to make that a priority for the Policy Committee.      .

articles.summary: West Essex faculty and staff attended professional development seminars and workshops involving artificial intelligence (AI) and its implications on education. articles.title: Competition Bureau Investigating If AI Is Being Used to Price-Fix Rental Rates
articles.author: The Epoch Times
articles.summary: Canada's Competition Bureau is looking into whether artificial intelligence (AI) tools are being used by landlords to set higher rental prices. If they find evidence of activities that could raise concerns under the law, they will take action. AI price-fixing involves real estate companies using tools and software that could be used to fix prices.

articles.title: We need to talk about the F word (‘friction' in enterprise, that is)
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Today, everything is frictionless. Frictionless product design, global consent tools, digital wallets and unified logins powered by Facebook and Google let companies expand and sell without making users complete forms, wade through privacy boilerplate or even enter payment details. WeWork failed to build a frictionless real-estate empire. Easy online betting drove bankruptcy rates up 30%. More friction might have kept Crowdstrike from bricking the world's computers.

articles.title: AI stuns scientists : Superbug mystery solved in 48 hours after decade long research
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: AI tool 'Co-Scientist' has solved a ten-year-old mystery surrounding antibiotic resistance in bacteria. Professor José R. Penadés and his team proposed a hypothesis that superbugs develop resistance by forming a tail made up of multiple viruses, allowing them to move between species. Google's AI tool confirmed their hypothesis and presented four additional valid hypotheses, expanding the research in unforeseen directions. Initial concerns arose that Google had accessed his unpublished research without permission, but they assured him there was no data breach.

articles.summary: Skin cancer is the most common form of skin cancer worldwide and 1 in 5 Americans develop it by age 70. Before the mid-1900s, having a nice summer glow was not common. When tanning became popular, there was an increase in skin cancer in the U.S. The most common basal cell skin cancer is found in sun-exposed areas and resembles pimples or nonhealing bumps in the skin that won't heal on their own. Melanoma is the other major skin cancer.

articles.title: Humans Outperform AI In Disease Coding Test
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: ChatGPT-based large language model failed to classify complex medical case documents, but researchers say the AI technology could still be of enormous benefit. James Cook University-led study put five human clinical document coders up against ChatGPT to analyse 100 randomly selected challenging clinical patient summaries across five major categories of diseases. The top human coder achieved 47%.

articles.title: OpenAI confirms 400 million weekly ChatGPT users - here's 5 great ways to use the world's most popular AI chatbot
articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz
articles.summary: ChatGPT is used by 400 million people a week. The AI chatbot is only a little over two years old. It's one of the most widely used digital tools on the planet. How you ask ChatGPT for something dramatically affects what you get in return.

articles.title: How are state legislatures computing with AI?
articles.summary: KUNR FM is experiencing technical difficulties on 91.3 in Winnemucca. Listen live here on KUNR.org or through the KUNr app. This month's episode of Purple Politics Nevada looks into how state legislatures are wrangling with artificial intelligence. It also features Democratic Assemblymember Joe Dalia, who has a bill to strengthen child pornography laws.

articles.title: Mercy Hospital Fort Smith to integrate AI in imaging services
articles.author: Justin Trobaugh
articles.summary: Mercy Hospital will integrate artificial intelligence into its imaging services using Aidoc technology. The hospital will begin a phased rollout of Aidoc's aiOS platform in Fort Smith and Oklahoma City. Aidoc CEO: Mercy is redefining what's possible in health care.

articles.title: FSU 2025 AI & Machine Learning Expo Explores EdTech
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: The 2025 Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Expo, AIMLX25, is set for 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Friday, February 28 at the Challenger Learning Center in Tallahassee. It's presented by the FSU Interdisciplinary Data Science Master's Degree Program. The expo's keynote speaker is Fengfeng Ke, the Clark Leadership Chair Professor of the College of Education at the University of Maryland.

articles.title: What Does Commercially Safe Generative AI Even Mean? Here's How Adobe's Answer
articles.author: Alexander Puutio
articles.summary: Adobe Firefly is a family of generative AI models that balance progress with guardrails and responsible innovation. Only 13% of GenAI solutions have achieved enterprise-level impact and 36% have scaled. The most important factor in AI's commercialization is trust.

articles.title: Job Seeker? Super Bowl Ads Can Teach You Some Smart Moves
articles.author: Rodger Dean Duncan
articles.summary: Stanford educated Soubhik Dawn founded a company called Upplai to help people market themselves with the tools and savvy of a seasoned brand manager. Recruiters spend 3-7 seconds scanning a résumé before they decide if it's worth a deeper look. Like a good Super Bowl ad, a job application needs to captivate immediately and communicate value.

articles.title: A Random Lesson For AI Agents From Monte Carlo
articles.author: Adrian Bridgwater
articles.summary: Monte Carlo is a method used to introduce randomness in otherwise deterministic models. It is used to predict the price of a stock a year from now. Monte Carlo methods are critical to many commercial endeavors, ranging from the modeling of financial risk in banks to predicting the behavior of advanced materials in aerospace applications.

articles.title: 3 Tips To Improve Your Critical Thinking Skills In The Age Of AI
articles.author: Pia Lauritzen
articles.summary: According to the World Economic Forum's Future of Jobs Survey, analytical thinking is the top core skill for employers in 2025. Creative thinking is fourth on the list of core skills, and systems thinking is at number 12. Martin Heidegger's "What Calls for Thinking?" lecture suggests to focus on thinking about and acting on long-term problems that can't be solved with a quick AI prompt.

articles.title: Google Releases New Feature Boost To Millions Of iPhone Owners
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Lens users on iOS can now use gestures to complete image searches using Google Lens. This is similar to the Circle to Search AI feature that has been heavily advertised on Samsung and Pixel devices. It's not clear if iOS users will have access to the full suite of Google's AI features.

articles.title: AI to remain one of Shanghai's leading industries
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence will continue to be one of Shanghai's leading industries. Its market scale has already exceeded 450 billion yuan ($62 billion) in 2024. Shanghai has been beefing up policy support for innovations and promoting technological breakthroughs. It is building a world-class high-end industrial cluster.

articles.title: 2025 Global Developer Conference offers platform for AI industry exchange
articles.author: China.dot.org
articles.summary: 2025 Global Developer Conference is being held in Shanghai from Friday to Sunday. The event has brought together top domestic and international artificial intelligence companies to showcase. Recent breakthroughs in open-source large model technologies and products create new opportunities and space for the development of China's artificial intelligence industry.

articles.title: Netradyne's® Driver Drowsiness with DMS Sensor® Awarded HDT 2025 Top 20 Product
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Netradyne is an industry-leading SaaS provider of artificial intelligence (AI) and edge computing. The editors of Heavy Duty have announced they will be using AI technology in their content.   Â   in the article "Heavy Duty will use AI in its content."

articles.title: Meta and X Approve AI Ads Referencing Nazi War Crimes Ahead of German Elections, Research Finds
articles.author: Adweek
articles.summary: Meta and X gave the green light to AI-generated ads that called for the gassing of immigrants in concentration camps and killing of people in concentration camp as per AI's recommendation.      Â   i.e. they approved the ads.

articles.title: Are people losing their critical thinking ability due to AI? Here's what we know
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: A recent study by researchers from Microsoft and Carnegie Mellon University has raised concerns about the negative side effects of using artificial intelligence. The benefits of using AI might be debatable, but it is here to stay, according to the researchers.

articles.title: North Korea Seen Using Chatgpt In AI Education
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: North Korea is apparently using ChatGPT, a generative artificial intelligence (AI) service developed by OpenAI of the United States, in its higher education AI program.   i.e. in its AI education program for the university students in North Korea.

articles.title: The Brutalist used AI for Adrien Brody's Oscar-nominated performance. Is that cheating?
articles.author: CBC
articles.summary: The Brutalist used artificial intelligence to adjust Adrien Brody and Felicity Jones's Hungarian movie set for artificial intelligence. It adjusted Brody's and Jones's roles based on the help of artificial intelligence and other data collected by the Brutalist's AI system.

articles.title: China's AI Breakthroughs Show How It Is Outcompeting Western Monopoly Capitalism
articles.author: Scheerpost
articles.summary: The Chinese company DeepSeek has made a major breakthrough in the development of artificial intelligence (AI) with the release of its deep learning model R1. Until now, the West had deemed China incapable of innovation, but now it innovates and the US imitates.

articles.title: Elon Musk and Donald Trump must get dealth penalty, says the billionaire's AI chatbot Grok
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Grok 3, the latest AI chatbot released by Elon Musk's xAI, said US President Donald Trump and the billionaire must get the death penalty. A data scientist posted on X, 'Jesus Christ dude, what did Musk create? lol'.   .

articles.title: The great tech rush: After DeepSeek wake-up call, how India plans to get a seat at AI high table
articles.author: Financial Express
articles.summary: Sundar Pichai, Google CEO, said AI is more important than electricity or fire. He was speaking at the World Economic Forum in 2018. He knew something that others did not as he is the head of a leading technology company. He is not indulging in hyperbole.

articles.title: IQ AI Launches Agent Tokenization Platform (ATP) to boost economy around AI Agents
articles.author: Coin Gape
articles.summary: IQ AI officially launched the Agent Tokenization Platform (ATP) on Friday. The platform aims to empower AI developers, businesses, and individual users by enabling the seamless monetization of artificial intelligence. It was developed in collaboration with NEAR and Fax.

articles.title: Microsoft CEO Admits That AI Is Generating Basically No Value
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: Satya Nadella has had it with the constant hype surrounding AI. His company invested billions of dollars in ChatGPT maker OpenAI. He thinks self-claiming some milestone is nonsensical benchmark hacking to him. He made the comments on a podcaster Dwarkesh Patel's show.

articles.title: Why is Central TB Division pushing an untested AI tool for screening?
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: The Central TB Division informed the States to consider using the DeepCXR tool only when the States reached out to CTD seeking AI solutions to analyse chest X-ray images. CTD will use the tool only if the States reach out to it for AI solutions.

articles.title: Will we squander the AI opportunity?
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: AI Action Summit in Paris emphasized the need to steer artificial intelligence in a more socially beneficial direction. There are calls for AI acceleration from Silicon Valley and now from the U.S. government. AI is a "bicycle for the mind" and should be steered in a positive direction.

articles.title: 3 Tips To Improve Your Critical Thinking Skills In The Age Of AI
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: It's not a matter of time before AI thinks faster and better than you. Here are three tips on where to focus for AI that will help you avoid mistakes made by AI in the future and focus on the right thing to do at the right moment.

articles.title: Humans outperform AI in disease coding test (James Cook University)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: An artificial intelligence model designed to classify complex medical case documents has been bested by its human challengers. Researchers say the technology could still be of enormous benefit to human coders who translate health records into standardised alphanumeric codes, however.   .

articles.title: Did THIS ai-powered robot attack people at a festival in China? Watch video
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Incident at a festival in China has raised concerns about the safety of artificial intelligence (AI) robots. A humanoid robot suddenly malfunctioned and began attacking attendees, prompting immediate action from the authorities.      Â  .   in Chinese

articles.title: Young people invited to join AI Visionaries Youth Club in York
articles.author: York Press
articles.summary: Youngsters in Acomb are invited to join a project combining artificial intelligence (AI) and creative storytelling in which they will work on a project involving AI and storytelling. The project is called "Artificial Intelligence and Creative Storytelling".

articles.title: Tripura starts using AI to identify tax evaders: CM Manik Saha
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Tripura Chief Minister Manik Saha said the state has been using artificial intelligence to identify tax evaders and will take action against them. He was addressing GST 'Jaagrookta Abhiyan' at Prajna Bhavan on Saturday.

articles.title: OpenAI has banned some users from using ChatGPT in China and North Korea; says using AI to ...
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: OpenAI has banned several users from China and North Korea from using its ChatGPT platform. They were exploiting the AI technology for malicious purposes, including surveillance and influence operations. According to OpenAI, the banned accounts were created by people from North Korea and China.

articles.title: Keys to AI adoption success: Right-sizing, CEO champion, human-centric strategy
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: 2025 is predicted to be the year artificial intelligence (AI) will make the big break into the mainstream. IBM believes Asia-Pacific enterprises are expected to move beyond AI experimentation to maximize the impact of their AI investments. Pia Azarcon, managing partner of IBM Asia Pacific, spoke to The Manila Times.

articles.title: How Generative AI is shaping cyber scams
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Scammers are using AI-assisted smart tools like ChatGPT and DeepSeek to create malicious content that can trick even the savviest among us. To protect children and young adults, some governments have taken steps to protect them from scammers.

articles.title: Globe integrates AI to meet customers' evolving needs
articles.author: The Philippine Star
articles.summary: Globe Telecommunications Inc. integrates Generative AI (GenAI) to streamline operations, optimize network performance and elevate customer service at Globe Telecommunications Inc., to ensure meeting customers' evolving needs and to meet their evolving needs.    GenAI is a technology developed by Google.

articles.title: 2 growth stocks to consider buying for the ‘second phase' of AI
articles.author: The Motley Fool
articles.summary: To date, the artificial intelligence (AI) story has been about the infrastructure buildout. We are moving into the second phase of the technology where tech companies are rolling out AI chips. Nvidia and Broadcom make AI chips for data centres and they have done well.

articles.title: N. Korea seen using ChatGPT in AI education
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Photo shows learning material on ChatGPT's functionalities used at Kim Il Sung University. North Korea is apparently using a generative artificial intelligence (AI) service developed by ChatG PT.   Â   in Voice of Korea, a Pyongyang external propaganda outlet.

articles.title: Chinese city launches robotaxi routes linking downtown, transportation hubs
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: A robotaxi in Guangzhou, China, has stopped and turned automatically without a driver present. The city center has much busier traffic and denser vehicle flow. Routes linking the city center to transportation hubs often pass through expressways, where vehicles travel faster.

articles.title: AI breakthroughs PH businesses need to know
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: The AI sector in the Philippines is set to grow at an impressive annual rate of 41.5 percent between 2025 and 2030. The market volume is expected to reach P82.09 billion by 2030. This surge is fueled by government initiatives in innovation and technology, and increasing demand.

articles.title: The next wave of AI is here: Autonomous AI agents are amazing—and scary
articles.author: Fast Company
articles.summary: The significance of autonomous AI agents may exceed the hype. An autonomous AI agent can interact with the user in a non-intrusive way. It's understandable if you've tuned out recent talk about autonomous AI, but it's not a good idea to ignore it.

articles.title: New Google AI Leak Reveals Powerful Gemini Video Upgrade
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google is testing new AI video creation features for Google Gemini, according to a new report. Google has not commented on the report.       iReport.com.  Google Gemini is a new AI-based video creation tool for Google.
